results.title: Use of direct renin inhibitor in an HIV positive subject.
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: A 61-year-old @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV-infected@@@ Caucasian male (CDC C3) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ for ten years and @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular complications@@@ took @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@ 25 mg twice a day, plus daily administration of @CHEMICAL_Irbesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077405 @@@irbesartan@@@ 300 mg, hydroclorotiazide 25 mg, @CHEMICAL_Doxazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017292 @@@doxazosin@@@ 4 mg, @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@lacidipine@@@ 6 mg, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg.

citations.NLM: Ucciferri C, Brescini L, Staffolania S, Falasca K, Cirioni O, Giacometti A, Vecchiet J. Use of direct renin inhibitor in an HIV positive subject. Infez Med. 2012 Mar;20(1):49-51. PMID: 22475660

results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis-induced acute kidney injury following concomitant use of Genvoya  (EVG/COBI/FTC/TAF) and simvastatin; a case report
results.text_hl: He also had dyslipidaemia which was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg for many years.

results.title: A high throughput Cre-lox activated viral membrane fusion assay identifies pharmacological inhibitors of HIV entry.
results.text_hl: Modest therapeutic indices for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nigericin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009550 @@@nigericin@@@ were observed in confirmatory @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV infection@@@ assays.
